text: Union Sportive de Boulogne-sur-Mer Côte d'Opale, or simply known as US Boulogne, is a French football team. They are based in the commune of Boulogne-sur-Mer. They currently play in the Championnat National. They are sometimes known as one of the former clubs of N'Golo Kanté and Franck Ribéry. ==Other websites== * * Official website Category:1898 establishments in France Category:French football clubs Category:Boulogne-sur-Mer
title: US Boulogne
